医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示 7 种锯棕榈产品符合解决尿路症状的识别标准《Journal of Urology Open Plus》上发表的一项新研究表明，7 种锯棕榈产品符合身份和功效标准，可有效解决与前列腺肥大相关的尿路症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-reveals-7-saw-palmetto-products-met-the-identity-standards-to-address-urinary-tract-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-reveals-7-saw-palmetto-products-met-the-identity-standards-to-address-urinary-tract-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f0c3df0-1aa8-4b1f-b9d8-7c3ce0bf3974 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 00:06:46 -0400 Study reveals 7 saw palmetto products met the identity standards to address urinary tract symptoms
研究发现网购运动服可能损害女性的身体形象虽然运动服在沙发上和在健身房里时都可能穿着，但运动服在女性中受欢迎的一个重要推动力是它与充满活力的生活方式、积极的幸福感和整体健康的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Online-shopping-for-activewear-may-be-harmful-to-womens-body-image-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Online-shopping-for-activewear-may-be-harmful-to-womens-body-image-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b16ce47-225c-4bbe-8ea0-0fa75929fad1 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 23:56:13 -0400 Online shopping for activewear may be harmful to women's body image, finds study
新的参考数据库 Greengenes2 提高了微生物组研究的可重复性由于加州大学圣地亚哥分校科学家领导的国际努力，两种领先的测序技术不再存在冲突。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/New-reference-database-Greengenes2-improves-reproducibility-of-microbiome-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/New-reference-database-Greengenes2-improves-reproducibility-of-microbiome-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b08b7afa-9533-4ef0-8f58-3d7e8b188dda Thu, 27 Jul 2023 23:04:40 -0400 New reference database Greengenes2 improves reproducibility of microbiome studies
研究：种族不是乳房重建后计划外住院的独立预测因素美国整形外科医生协会 (ASPS) 的官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》八月号上的一项研究报告称，种族/族裔并不是接受乳房重建手术的患者再次入院的独立预测因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-Race-not-an-independent-predictor-of-unplanned-hospitalization-after-breast-reconstruction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-Race-not-an-independent-predictor-of-unplanned-hospitalization-after-breast-reconstruction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=116b472b-be1b-446b-a2c6-14c55aded6b0 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 23:02:49 -0400 Study: Race not an independent predictor of unplanned hospitalization after breast reconstruction
研究调查了公众对影响健康保险获取的行政障碍的看法在 COVID-19 大流行期间，各国政府更改了与医疗补助登记相关的规则和程序。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-investigates-public-perceptions-of-administrative-barriers-affecting-health-insurance-access.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-investigates-public-perceptions-of-administrative-barriers-affecting-health-insurance-access.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1133d22f-58e3-4724-b8c0-c3002a9ff5d8 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 22:59:55 -0400 Study investigates public perceptions of administrative barriers affecting health insurance access
新分析确定了影响整形手术患者 Yelp 评论的因素你会给你的整形外科医生打几颗星？美国整形外科医师学会的官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》九月号报道称，对 Yelp 评论的分析确定了一系列与外科医生和实践相关的因素，这些因素影响整形外科患者留下正面还是负面的评论（ASPS）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/New-analysis-identizes-factors-that-influence-plasty-surgery-病人-Yelp-reviews.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/New-analysis-identizes-factors-that-influence-plasty-surgery-病人-Yelp-reviews.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8f84b8b-2559-49d6-9a24-dfaf9e8a021b Thu, 27 Jul 2023 22:56:20 -0400 New analysis identifies factors that influence plastic surgery patients' Yelp reviews
研究人员试图了解胰岛素泵技术的致命弱点自 20 世纪 80 年代初胰岛素泵开始广泛使用以来，它已成为 1 型糖尿病患者控制血糖水平的选择，而无需每天多次检测血糖和注射胰岛素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Researchers-seek-to-understand-the-Achilles-heel-of-insulin-pump-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Researchers-seek-to-understand-the-Achilles-heel-of-insulin-pump-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7a056dd-9da3-4ad8-875f-10558fd34815 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 22:53:13 -0400 Researchers seek to understand the Achilles' heel of insulin pump technology
广谱流感候选疫苗显示了三个剂量水平的安全性、免疫原性数据Osivax 是一家生物制药公司，开发疫苗以提供针对高度突变传染性病毒的广谱保护，该公司今天宣布，《柳叶刀传染病》杂志发表了该公司 OVX836-003 研究的结果，标题为“OVX836 的免疫原性、安全性和初步功效评估”基于核蛋白的通用甲型流感候选疫苗：随机、双盲安慰剂对照 2a 期试验。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Broad-spectrum-influenza-vaccine-candidate-shows-safety-immunogenicity-data-across- Three-dose-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Broad-spectrum-influenza-vaccine-candidate-shows-safety-immunogenicity-data-across- Three-dose-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfe0c7ee-f060-45bb-8a6e-e29acb28f697 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 22:45:29 -0400 Broad-spectrum influenza vaccine candidate shows safety, immunogenicity data across three dose levels
科学家绘制 kappa 阿片受体 3D 结构图阿片类药物仍然是医学上最有效、最有效的止痛药，但它们也是最容易上瘾的药物之一，过量服用会阻止人的呼吸能力。这可能是致命的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Scientists-map-3D-struct-of-kappa-opioid-receptor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Scientists-map-3D-struct-of-kappa-opioid-receptor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b4f454f-0938-4ce4-9655-5fd2842ec374 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 22:41:03 -0400 Scientists map 3D structure of kappa opioid receptor
支持性管理者是减少疗养院使用身体束缚的关键一项新的 Cochrane 审查发现，当一线护理人员得到支持性管理者的授权时，可以减少对护理之家居民的身体约束，而不会增加跌倒的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Supportive-managers-key-to-reducing-use-of-physical-restraints-in-nursing-homes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Supportive-managers-key-to-reducing-use-of-physical-restraints-in-nursing-homes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6291762c-d6f6-4d81-ac60-30fb3a007c67 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 22:37:14 -0400 Supportive managers key to reducing use of physical restraints in nursing homes
